_header: The thirsty give drink hungry thou feed
_description: The VII Works of Mercy Bodily — six lines

BodHat12.First Lines:
þe thristy gif drynke hungry þou fedeþe herberles to
                    house þou lede…
BodHat12.Last Lines:
…To men in presoun þou socour bedeByry þe dede
                    þar sees nede
